task.summary: adding new files to make this a game
Adding Player to make this a game
WIP: Trying to save and load player
WIP: Trying to save and load player... Getting there
WIP: Can create, load, save player and quit
WIP: Location generation refactor works but still needs more details.

WIP: Added a very basic base for enemy maps and enemy locations. IAttackable and IBersekable interfaces added. Abstract class Enemy added. several classes to implement or extend interfaces and abstract class.
A little more refactoring of GamePlay class. Starting to do fightin stuff. Got an initiative going with player and enemies (rollATwenty)
WIP: Got some fight functionality working. Still need to refine and refactor, but it's getting there.
WIP: Got some fight functionality working. Still need to refine and refactor, but it's getting there.
Start of complete refactor. Refactored player and enemy to extend Character class and created Equipable for weapon variations.
WIP: More refactoring of game play and fight methods
